name: Flip Edge
description:
The simplest focus game to rule them all is here! Follow the Yellow Circle and let's see how far can you go. Game over when the red one's out! Flip Edge is here!
-No In App Purchases
-No micro transactions
-No additional downloads/No internet requirements to play
-Very small file size, consumes less memory and supports older iOS devices

Enjoy my latest game!


Visit sites here:
https://m.facebook.com/getemilio/
https://m.facebook.com/reddstudiosapps/
https://itunes.apple.com/us/developer/ranz-ursal/id1116871834


Thank you for playing!
